author: llu
msg: MAPREDUCE-4660. Update task placement policy for network topology with node group. (Junping Du via llu)

author: gordonsmith
msg: Falcon feature tests: Added a feature test for the <Metadata> tag.
It appears that Falcon doesn't automatically keep such metadata; you have to use -keep-as3-metadata if it isn't one of the types like Event and Style that are kept by default. This is probably a bug.
Made it possible to pass additional compilation options like -keep-as3-metadata when compiling feature tests.

author: jlowe
msg: svn merge -c 1425167 FIXES: MAPREDUCE-4833. Task can get stuck in FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP. Contributed by Robert Parker
